Fellow players, I've reached this final stage by balancing strategic gameplay with genuine relationships. Throughout our journey, I've remained consistent and transparent about my intentions, forming authentic connections while making difficult decisions when necessary.

I respect P3's gameplay, but I believe my approach has been more balanced—combining social awareness with strategic moves that advanced us all further in the game. I never betrayed alliances unnecessarily and always gave straightforward reasons for my votes.

Thank you for considering my journey. I would be honored to have your vote as the winner.
